name: Barbarian Nations
description:
Barbarian Nations

Nomads of the past fight for supremacy over the barbaric Isles of Barbarius. The constant struggle for power waged with fist and steel.

Will your tribe thrive or die at the hands of your choices?

Barbarian Nations is an ongoing challenge for myself. Can one solo developer create a Real Time Strategy game on their own?

As it stands there is one playable demo level, showcasing the mechanics and overall feel to the game I wish to develop. Please note that this is an extremely early Alpha, and I am releasing this as such. So by all means let me know of all the bugs you come across.

CONTROLS

  • Left click to select a unit
  • Right click to interact with the world (Attack, harvest Lumber, move)
  • Right click with a unit selected on the Woodcutters hut to build a woodcutter (the main resource in the game)
  • Right click on Trees to harvest with a Woodcutter.

All compositions and art work are original for this game. All feedback is greatly appreciated.
